## blockRendering.RenderInfo.getSpacerRowHeight\_() method

Calculate the height of a spacer row.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getSpacerRowHeight_(_prev: Row, _next: Row): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_prev | [Row](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.row_class.md) | The row before the spacer. |
|  \_next | [Row](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.row_class.md) | The row after the spacer. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The desired height of the spacer row between these two rows.
